description: Guns are the primary weapons for ships

maxAngleVar.description: Maximum angle variation for a shot from the center of the gun

angleVarDamp.description: Puts a damper or delay on the angle variation

angleVarPerShot.description: Controls how much the angle of the bullet can vary from shot to shot

timeBetweenShots.description: Controls how fast the gun fires

reloadTime.description: Amount of time in seconds it takes for the gun to reload

price.description: Amount the gun costs to buy at a station

clipName.description: Module path of the clip the gun uses to fire

gunLength.description: Multiplier used to scale the gun length

displayName.description: Name to be displayed in inventories and trading stations

shootSounds.description: An array to iterate over when firing the gun for audio assets to be played

reloadSounds.description: An array to iterate over when reloading the gun for audio assets to be played

fixed.description: Controls whether the gun is fixed in place

texLenPerc.description: Multiplier to scale the length of the projetile's texture

lightOnShot.description: Whether the gun should show a light at the muzzle when it fires
